description: This file defines a React functional component named StatCard, which displays a KPI value with optional trend indication, icon, and styling. It handles loading and empty states and utilizes imported UI components Card and Badge.

methods.name: StatCard({ title, value, trend, icon = "📊", change, loading = false, placeholder = "—", })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a KPI value with optional trend, icon, and gradient styling. Handles loading and empty states.

ctags.name: StatCard
ctags.signature: ({ title, value, trend, icon = "📊", change, loading = false, placeholder = "—", })
